Package com.cg.onlinefooddeliverysystem.service

Class OrderTest

java.lang.Object
com.cg.onlinefooddeliverysystem.service.OrderTest
public class OrderTest extends Object
Unit tests for the Order class in the Online Food Delivery System. Tests the creation, validation, and status changes of orders, including inventory updates and delivery person assignment. The tests include: Successful creation of an order with correct details, status, and delivery person assignment. Order failure if a requested item is not in the inventory. Order failure if requested quantity exceeds available stock. Order failure if no delivery person is available. Completing an order updates its status and frees the delivery person. Example usage: Map<String, Integer> request = new HashMap<>(); request.put("Pizza", 2); Order order = new Order(customer, request, inventory, deliveryPersons); assertEquals("In progress", order.getStatus()); order.completeOrder(); assertEquals("Completed", order.getStatus());
Since:
1.0
Author:
(Divya Sinha)
